entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: SSW 14 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
